The more advanced Xyber e-bike is down from its $3,300 MSRP here, which we’ve previously seen dropping lowest to $3,000, especially since the newest Myon e-bike hit the market following CES 2026. items.title: Elgato’s popular Wave:3 microphone is down to its lowest price today at $100
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Elgato’s Wave:3 microphone in black down to $99.99 shipped. This is regularly a $150 unit, which is now seeing a $50 discount. While this mic has seen several discounts over the years, it hasn’t dropped this low in quite some time. In fact, only once before today have we seen it hit the $100 price point during a Prime Day sale, and it quickly shot back up shortly after. Today’s deal brings that rare all-time low back, making it a great time to grab one if you’ve been waiting for a notable discount. You can also get this mic in white, although it’s currently $104.99 shipped with a relatively lighter deal. Head below for more details.

items.title: Jackery’s latest 1,536Wh Explorer 1500 Ultra power station with IP65 port covers falls to second-best $949 rate (Reg. $1,299)
items.summary:
While we aren’t getting an official Presidents Day Sale from Jackery, the popular backup power brand is offering a collection of Winter Backup deals (up to 54% off), alongside which we spotted the newest Explorer 1500 Ultra Portable Power Station down at $949 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing by $50. It’s coming down from a $1,299 MSRP, which surprisingly starts higher from $1,399 at Amazon. Since debuting and launching from CES 2026 with a discount to $899, we saw that same price cut repeat later in January, before spending most of the time since dropping to $999. Now, you’re getting a 27% markdown that cuts $350 off the going rate for the second-lowest price we have tracked. On the same page, you can find a bundle option giving you the power station with two 200W solar panels for $1,499 shipped, which is the same low we saw launch with the standalone unit at CES 2026.
